alert.note: Alert for Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument; Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 13 at 9:10PM MST until January 17 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Total snow accumulations of up to 3 to 7 inches possible above 7000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph Sunday. * WHERE...Chiricahua Mountains and Dragoon and Mule and Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains. * WHEN...From Sunday evening through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact mountain roads.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument; Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon
